DOC.criteria: Registered male female primary Liver transplant candidate Age ≥18 year old Signed : write informed consent Acute , fulminant liver failure ; Prior solid organ bone marrow transplant ; Chronic use hemodialysis diagnosis chronic renal failure , define chronic serum creatinine > 3 mg/dl ( > 265 mmol/L ) > 2 week and/or require hemodialysis ; Multiorgan transplant ; Ventilator dependent ; Dependent > 1 IV inotrope maintain hemodynamics ; Malignancy exclude HCC ; Infection .
